name: LottoDice
description:
"Enjoy multiple chances in rolling your lottery numbers.
This is the only game on iOS where you can roll multiple times to pick your lottery numbers.

Game Features
- Stunning 3d graphics
- Multiple chances to roll new numbers
- Share numbers with friends and family

How To Play

1) Engage the button and a set of random numbers will be displayed
2) To display a new set of numbers gently shake your mobile device or swipe the screen
3) Place the chosen numbers on any appropriate lottery sheet at your local participating lottery establishment"
